Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I recently flew a new horizons replica to Eeloo, to replicate the mission conducted in real life.

I'm attempting to present the mission in a realistic, chronological way.

Enjoy the Presentation!

**Launch Details**

-I put the spacecraft in a sol escape trajectory that will take me past Eeloo. It was hard to get an encounter with Jool, and slingshot my way to Eeloo. So i had to skip the step.

**Spacecraft Design**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/GFH6a)

**15 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 3,000,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![JPBL0mK.png](http://i.imgur.com/JPBL0mK.png)

Description: The first image taken of Eeloo. Only 2 pixels wide.

**13 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 2,500,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![VUP5qNV.png](http://i.imgur.com/VUP5qNV.png)

Description: 2nd Lorri Image. Starting to speculate if Eeloo is circular at all.

**12 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 2,320,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![YRBTqgO.png](http://i.imgur.com/YRBTqgO.png)

Description: Still blurry.

**11 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 1,900,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![mTBh5GO.png](http://i.imgur.com/mTBh5GO.png)

Description: Able to make out its color.

**10 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 1,480,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![qA1cENH.png](http://i.imgur.com/qA1cENH.png)

Description: Wow.

**9 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 1,120,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![7VpH9jz.png](http://i.imgur.com/7VpH9jz.png)

Description: It is speculated that Eeloo may be shaped like an odd potato.

**8 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 770,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![97Yd19A.png](http://i.imgur.com/97Yd19A.png)

Description: Eeloo is in fact, circular.

**7 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 550,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![MTNpB9s.png](http://i.imgur.com/MTNpB9s.png)

Description: You can start to see some canyons and ridges.

**6 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 350,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![PjSafp2.png](http://i.imgur.com/PjSafp2.png)

Description: Eeloo has craters?

**5 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 290,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![YVpBGQw.png](http://i.imgur.com/YVpBGQw.png)

Description: This photo is 120 times clearer than the first one.

**4 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 220,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![JSYVKx2.png](http://i.imgur.com/JSYVKx2.png)

Description: Hype!

**3 Days to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 190,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![2NwEHiU.png](http://i.imgur.com/2NwEHiU.png)

Description: It resembles a giant snowball.

**1 Day to Encounter**

Distance from Eeloo: 112,000,000m

LORRI Image: ![09pWEUZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/09pWEUZ.png)

Description: Last photo taken before flyby.

**Photos Taken during Flyby**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/f7ljO)

After the mission, New Horizons shall visit any Kuiper Belt objects. Sadly there is no Kuiper Belt in KSP. [Take the hint, Devs!]

Thanks for viewing this presentation!
